alert.note: Alert for Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:18PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Klamath County through 445 PM PDT... At 417 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Annie Creek Snow Park, or 14 miles south of Crater Lake, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Annie Creek Snow Park. This includes the following highways... Highway 62 in Oregon between mile markers 82 and 86. Highway 66 in Oregon Highway 70 in Oregon Interstate 5 in Oregon US 101 in Oregon MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades
